document.full_text: bankrupt bookseller borders group inc  said it has received indications of third-party interest for its business that could keep it running as a going concern, a source close to the matter told reuters.
document.title: borders group in talks for deal: source
lines_and_colors: bankrupt bookseller borders group inc  said it has received indications of third-party interest for its business that could keep it running as a going concern, a source close to the matter told reuters.
